LanguageData.OxygenAtmosphere.label: oxygen atmosphere
LanguageData.OxygenAtmosphere.description: The basic thermoregulation and life support system not designed to work in such severe for Avali conditions without additional equipment or augments. To survive more than day you colonists must have life support belts or armors with life support system. Minimal summary enviromental protection level must be non less then 15%.
LanguageData.OxygenAtmosphere.stages.0.label: 10 hours to death
LanguageData.OxygenAtmosphere.stages.1.label: 9 hours to death
LanguageData.OxygenAtmosphere.stages.2.label: 8 hours to death
LanguageData.OxygenAtmosphere.stages.3.label: 7 hours to death
LanguageData.OxygenAtmosphere.stages.4.label: 6 hours to death
LanguageData.OxygenAtmosphere.stages.5.label: 5 hours to death
LanguageData.OxygenAtmosphere.stages.6.label: 4 hours to death
LanguageData.OxygenAtmosphere.stages.7.label: 3 hours to death
LanguageData.OxygenAtmosphere.stages.8.label: 2 hours to death
LanguageData.OxygenAtmosphere.stages.9.label: 1 hour to death
LanguageData.AvaliBiology.label: avali biology
LanguageData.ToxicImmunity.label: toxic immunity
LanguageData.ToxicImmunity.description: This colonist has 100% environmental protection, so no more susceptible to any kind of environmental hazards. Toxic Follouts no longer cause them any harm.
LanguageData.AvaliAgeTracker.label: avali kit age tracker
LanguageData.CantTalk.label: can't talk
LanguageData.AvaliSugarEffect.label: high on sugar
LanguageData.AvaliSugarEffect.description: This Avali high on sugar, they have enhanced senses, move and work at 50% faster, but get tired at 250% faster.
